Html:
Please when compile a Smart Device project in VB.NET show error with IExcelDataReader - VS 2008.

Error:
Reference required to assembly 'System.Data, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral,
PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' containing the implemented interface 'System.Data.IDataReader. Add one to your project.

Thanks,
Edwin

I've not tried this with Smart Device (is that Windows CE?) but it sounds like the assembly is not in the place that it expects because the framework versions / libs are different.

Are you able to troubleshoot using this approach http://geekswithblogs.net/simonc/archive/2013/04/19/inside-portable-class-libraries.aspx ? It details how portable class libs are used.
